events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department due to your software development experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to ensure smooth communication throughout the hiring process.
The initial screening call went well; your background matches the requirements of our software engineer role closely.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th. Please prepare accordingly to demonstrate your engineering skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully, showing strong problem-solving abilities and proficiency in software development.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was positive; you expressed great enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
We have proposed you an offer reflecting your skills and experience as a software engineer at our company.
You responded affirmatively to the offer and expressed excitement about the next steps.
You have officially accepted the engineering position offer; welcome aboard!
Your onboarding process has begun, including access to engineering tools and team introductions.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are fully onboarded as a new software engineer with our company.
